title: How To Stay Organized And Sane As A Busy Mom
summary: A list of checklists for your daily routine is a great way to stay organized as a busy mom. Cleaning as you go will ensure that messes donâ€™t become overwhelming and cause you to avoid cleaning altogether. Set a timer to help you stay on top of multiple tasks. Find a cleaning buddy or two can help keep you motivated to get things done. Schedule in time for self-care for yourself and carve out some time each week to do something that makes you feel relaxed and happy.

If you\u2019re feeling disorganized, a checklist can help you get back on track. This \u201Cshoulder\u201D friend could be a family member, another mom, your partner, a close friend, etc."),mdx("p",null,"The key to successfully using this strategy is to choose someone who is willing to listen without judging you, criticizing you, or trying to \u201Cfix\u201D your problems. Someone who is willing to simply listen, ask questions if they don\u2019t understand what you\u2019re going through, and empathize with you."),mdx("h2",null,"Make a chore wheel"),mdx("p",null,"A chore wheel is a great way to keep track of chores and avoid arguments about who does what. Simply create a chore wheel with the different chores for your home, and assign each person one or two chores. This can work for kids and adults. There are also chore wheels you can use online, or you can create your own using a dry erase board or poster board."),mdx("p",null,"Keep in mind that this is just a visual way of keeping track of chores, not a way of assigning them. You can\u2019t assign a chore to someone because they \u201Cowe\u201D you. Choose one cleaning task each week and make it into a regular habit. For example, every Sunday do some sort of cleaning task like sweeping and mopping floors, washing dishes, etc. Once you make it a habit, it will be something you don\u2019t even have to think about. You can also set aside a certain day of the week for certain cleaning tasks. For example, have cleaning day on Saturday, or make Friday \u201Cbathroom cleaning day\u201D. This can help keep you from feeling totally overwhelmed."),mdx("ul",null,mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},"Make cleaning a habit: Make cleaning a habit."),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},"Declutter regularly: Clutter can make it harder to keep your house clean and organized. Simply decluttering regularly can make a big difference."),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},"Keep lists: Keep lists of everything in your home. If you\u2019re feeling overwhelmed and are feeling like you can\u2019t keep up with everything, don\u2019t be afraid to ask for help."),mdx("ul",null,mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},"Ask for help from your partner."),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},"Ask for help from friends or family."),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},"Ask for help from a service like Helpling if you need a one-off cleaning done."),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},"Ask for help from a neighborhood kid: Sometimes just having someone to talk to and help around the house can make a huge difference in your mood and ability to handle things.")),mdx("h2",null,"Conclusion"),mdx("p",null,"Being a busy mom can be challenging, but being organized can help you to stay on top of things."),mdx("p",null,"There are many different ways to stay on top of things as a busy mom, but the most important thing is to be realistic and consistent. relatedArticles.title: 5 Ways to Reduce Stress during the Holiday Season
10 Easy Ways to Make Your Home More Energy Efficient

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`As the cost of living continues to rise, it\u2019s more important than ever for Americans to find ways to save money and stay within a budget. After all, no one wants to feel like they\u2019re drowning in bills every month.
To that end, everyone could probably stand to tighten their belts a little bit when it comes to their day-to-day expenses; after all, there are several small things we can do on a daily basis that will collectively add up and help us save money in the long run. In this blog post, we\u2019ll cover everything you need to know about energy efficiency at home and how you can start saving money by making your house more efficient today!`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,"Mediation is a great way for parties to resolve their disputes in an amicable environment. It is also a less expensive, private and confidential process that can help the parties reach an agreement quickly. While mediation works best when both parties are willing to negotiate and compromise, it does not always work out that way in real life. Some cases require the help of a neutral third-party who can guide the parties towards coming to a settlement agreement based on fair grounds. A neutral third party known as a mediator will not take sides and instead help both parties find common ground so they can reach an agreement without going to court or any other type of resolution process. So if you are involved in a dispute and want to avoid the stress, expense, and time consuming legal proceedings while keeping your relationship with your family members intact then mediation may be right for you"))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: How to Make Time for Your Hobbies

intro.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,"When you love something, it feels like there\u2019s not enough time in the day to do everything you want to do. But at the same time, when you don\u2019t have anything that fills your days with joy and meaning, it feels like there are not enough hours in a week. Many people struggle with finding time for their hobbies. They either feel too busy or believe that they simply don\u2019t have the opportunities to pursue something they enjoy. This feeling is understandable\u2014because most people lead incredibly busy lives. Work, school, family, friends, and other obligations take up a lot of time and energy. So how can you carve out some time for your hobbies? It might seem impossible right now\u2014but trust us, it\u2019s possible! Even if your schedule feels full beyond measure right now, there are always little cracks of space that can grow and expand into larger windows of opportunity."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Mediation, like other forms of dispute resolution, is not free. You pay for it either directly by paying the mediator or indirectly by paying the lawyers. But how much does mediation cost?
Mediation costs will vary depending on where you live, the nature of your dispute, and the reputation of the mediator or firm you choose to take on your case.
While some attorneys may offer their clients a choice between litigation and a certain number of hours of mediation at a reduced rate as an alternative to litigation, most attorneys charge their standard rates for mediation services.
The hourly rate for a private mediator may range from $100 per hour to $300 per hour or more; however, most mediators will have standard market rates that fall within that range. Many corporations and nonprofit organizations negotiate group discounts when contracting with third-party mediation services. In general, expect to spend $200 to $500 per party for a one-day mediation session with two neutral mediators and an independent arbiter.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: How to Deal with a Partner Who's Always on Their Computer

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`When you enter into a relationship with another person, you\u2019ll naturally want to spend as much time together as possible. It can be super easy to fall into a routine when you\u2019re spending so much time with each other. You go to work, come home, and then retreat to your respective rooms for the rest of the night. And while that routine is totally normal and understandable at this stage in your relationship, it might not be exactly what you\u2019re looking for.
It\u2019s easy to get jealous or resentful if your partner is always on their computer \u2014 but that doesn\u2019t mean that there isn\u2019t a reason for their constant use of it. It could be that they are really passionate about something they\u2019re researching online or maybe they have an online business venture they\u2019ve been working on for a while now. However, if this is causing tension between you two, speak up! They may not even realize how much time they spend on their computer and just how much of an impact it has on your relationship. Here are some ways to deal with a partner who's always on their computer:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: How to Deal with Trust Issues in Relationships

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:t,...e}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...e,components:t,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`When you first start dating someone, trust probably isn\u2019t the biggest issue on your mind. You\u2019re getting to know this person and trying to figure out if there might be a potential future with them or not. However, once you get into a relationship with this person and things get more serious, trust can very quickly become an issue.
Even if you don\u2019t trust someone right away, that doesn\u2019t mean the trust issues don\u2019t come up later on. It may take time for them to make you feel uneasy or distrustful of your partner. But it also could be something that crops up almost immediately \u2013 especially if you meet them in a place like a nightclub, bar or other place where people tend to hookup without much thought as to who they\u2019re hooking up with! This article will offer some tips on how to deal with these trust issues in relationships and help resolve any problems from arising in the first place.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: 50 Ways to Keep the Spark Alive in Your Relationship
How to Get over a Break-Up

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`In the unfortunate event that you find yourself in a situation where you need to get over a break-up, it\u2019s important to know what to do in order to help the healing process along. Break-ups are never easy, and they can be even more difficult and hurtful if it\u2019s with your first love or someone you really cared about. These tips will help get you through any heartbreak and back into a place of peace.
When you experience a break-up, whether it\u2019s from a partner, friend or family member, it leaves you with an empty feeling. It hurts so much because you placed so many emotions into the relationship that it now feels like a part of who you are has been taken from you. Even though the person who broke up with you may have been oblivious to the pain they were causing by ending things, that doesn\u2019t make breaking up any easier for anyone involved.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Top 10 Best Cat Breeds in the World

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Cats are mysterious creatures, it\u2019s almost impossible to know what they\u2019re thinking. But that hasn\u2019t stopped cat lovers from all over the world falling head over heels in love with these cuddly felines. Whether you like them for their beauty, intelligence or simply for their cuteness, there is no denying that cats make wonderful pets.
There are a wide range of different breeds of cat but generally speaking there are two main categories; longhaired and shorthaired cats. Within these two groups there are numerous sub-groups and hybrids with specific traits from different types of cat \u2013 check out this article to learn more about the basic types of cat!`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
